area.key: Sorry you can't update without fixing the license issue first.

The validation queue HTTP module is not running, this means validation tasks will not execute. Check the user manual how you can configure validation queue HTTP module manually.

When you enable notifications you will receive email notifications when errors are found on the site at the scheduled time.
Emails will be send to the email address assigned to your user account '{0}'.
Change email settings for the email that gets sent when a scheduled validation occured and documents are added to the validation queue.
Change email settings for the email that gets sent when a notification email is sent to the user.
Select the mail template to render the body for the email

This domain will be used to generate the Canonical meta tag. Make sure to enter the production domain of the website.

Leave empty if you don't want to use Canonical domains.
Specify a not found page the {0} language.
Add or remove entries to the robots.txt file for . When not modified the default robots.txt template will be used. To learn more about the robots.txt file visit robotstxt.org.
SEO Checker datatype is missing from this document type. SEO Checker cannot analyze keywords when editing content without this data type.
SEO Checker datatype is missing from this document type. SEO Checker cannot analyze keywords when editing content without this data type.
When the title from content is empty SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the title tag. Node Name is a good property to use since that property is always required

When the description tag from content is empty it SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the meta description tag. Only the first paragraph will be used in case this default description tag property is used!

Use a template to display the title property in a specific format, used in the SEO Datatype and Library
Sample

[#@seoTitle] | SEO Checker
[#@seoTitle] | [$siteName] © 2013

Placeholder syntax
[# propertyAlias]
[$ propertyAlias] (recursive)

Fixed properties:
@nodeName (Name of page)
@seoTitle (the seo title property)

When the twitter:title is empty SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the twitter:title tag. Node Name is a good property to use since that property is always required
When empty the SEO title is used

When the twitter:description tag from content is empty it SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the twitter:description tag. Only the first paragraph will be used in case this default description tag property is used!
When empty the SEO description is used
When the twitter:image is not set SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the twitter:image tag.
The type of twitter card to render.

Use a template to display the twitetr:Title property in a specific format, used in the Twitter Datatype and Library
Sample

[#@seoTitle] | SEO Checker
[#@seoTitle] | [$siteName] © 2013

Placeholder syntax
[# propertyAlias]
[$ propertyAlias] (recursive)

Fixed properties:
@nodeName (Name of page)
@seoTitle (the seo title property)
When empty the SEO template is used

Helps search engines indicate if documents based on this documenttype need to be in the index:

index will include the document
noindex will not include the document

Helps search engines indicate if it needs to follow links for documents based on this documenttype need to be in the index:

follow will follow the links
nofollow will not follow the links
Check this option if you always want to exclude this documenttype from the xml sitemap
Specify the priority for the sitemap from 0.1 (lowest priority) to 1.0 (highest priority)
Specify how frequently pages based on this doctype will change.

When the og:title is empty SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the og:title tag. Node Name is a good property to use since that property is always required
When empty the SEO title is used

When the og:description tag from content is empty it SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the og:description tag. Only the first paragraph will be used in case this default description tag property is used!
When empty the SEO description is used
When the og:image is not set SEOChecker will use the selected properties to render the og:image tag.

Use a template to display the title property in a specific format, used in the Facebook Datatype and Library
Sample

[#@seoTitle] | SEO Checker
[#@seoTitle] | [$siteName] © 2013

Placeholder syntax
[# propertyAlias]
[$ propertyAlias] (recursive)

Fixed properties:
@nodeName (Name of page)
@seoTitle (the seo title property)
When empty the SEO template is used
When selected the page will be validated after publish and issues will be added to the issues list
By default only empty alt attributes on user edited content will be validated. When this option is enabled the check also occurs on images created in templates.
When selected all documents (and children) with property umbracoNaviHide set to true will be excluded from the generated Xml Sitemap
Search engines treat the URLs with or without www as different. This is causing duplicate content issues. Only select ignore when you solve this issue using your own URLRewriting module!
Force using trailing slash in url's (www.example.com/url/)
Force remove trailing slash from url's (www.example.com/url)
Search engines treat the URLs with or without trailing slash as different. This is causing duplicate content issues.Only select ignore when you solve this issue using URLRewriting!
Store domain for not found urls

When enabled the domain will be stored in case of a not found url. This allows you to redirect to a different page for different domains(www.example.com/contact and clients.example.com/contact).

The domain can be removed or added manually when editing the redirect.
Store querystring for not found urls

When enabled the querystring from the original request will be stored in case of a not found url. This allows you to redirect the same page with a different querystring to a different umbraco page. For example /page.php?id=234 redirect to /news/ and page.php?id=432 redirects to /contact/

The querystring can be removed or added manually when editing the redirect.
When enabled the querystring from the original request will be forwarded to the redirect page.
When enabled Seochecker will check for a redirect, even when the page exists. When not selected SEOChecker only checks for a redirect when the requested page could not be found.
Add the twitter account of the organization here. This will be used for twittercard.

The keyword you want to rank this page for, example:
Umbraco editor
When left empty the configured SEO title property for the document type will be used
The keywords tag will be ignored by most search engines!
When left empty the configured SEO description property for the document type will be used
